name: Quantitative Analyst
description:
A one-of-a-kind firm operating at the bleeding edge of technical ideas. Our customer has risen to prominence in the HFT (algorithmic trading) industry in recent years, having assembled one of the greatest teams of developers and data scientists on the market. Trading occurs all throughout the world on many platforms, both traditional and cryptocurrency. The platform is a product of its own creation.

The company's founder is a high-level data scientist and one of the greatest machine learning experts on the market. He is a world-class professional who is well familiar with the "product," with the team. Clearly seeing the goals and willing to devote whatever resources are required to attain them.

Typical Duties Include:

The team consists of motivated, expert artisans who have been meticulously picked and professionally "spread" around the organization's territory.

The organization will be able to provide everything required for professional growth and the resolution of the most challenging technological challenges. A once-in-a-lifetime chance with huge potential.

We are looking for Data Analyst Python who will cover data engineering, architecture and development of trading algorithms (with the ability to use C ++)

What We Look For In You:

  • Ability to use python for the above tasks, understanding the basics of software development
  • Pandas, NumPy
  • Attentiveness, accuracy, perfectionism in the code

Why You Should Join Our Team?

  • Great challenges with fast feedback loops
  • A welcoming group of highly qualified international professionals
  • Cutting-edge hardware and technology
  • Comfortable Moscow office or remotely anywhere in the world
  • Flexible schedule
  • 40 days of paid vacation
  • Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
